com.amplifyframework.datastore

Class DataStoreConfiguration

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.amplifyframework.datastore.DataStoreConfiguration

  • public final class DataStoreConfiguration
extends java.lang.Object
    Configuration options for AWSDataStorePlugin.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  DataStoreConfiguration.Builder
      Builds instances of AWSDataStorePlugin by providing a variety of configuration methods.

      • defaults

        public static DataStoreConfiguration defaults()
                                       throws DataStoreException
        Creates an DataStoreConfiguration which uses all default values.
        Returns:
        A default DataStoreConfiguration
        Throws:
        DataStoreException - exception thrown if there's an unexpected configuration key or an invalid configuration value

      • getSyncIntervalMs

        public java.lang.Long getSyncIntervalMs()
        Get the sync interval, expressed in milliseconds. The sync interval is the amount of time after a base sync, during which the optimized delta-sync may be requested, instead of a full base sync.
        Returns:
        The sync interval, expressed in milliseconds

      • getSyncIntervalInMinutes

        public java.lang.Long getSyncIntervalInMinutes()
        Gets the sync interval, expressed in minutes. This method serves the same purpose as getSyncIntervalMs() -- except, for convenience, returns the value in minutes, not milliseconds.
        Returns:
        The sync interval, expressed in minutes

      • getSyncMaxRecords

        public java.lang.Integer getSyncMaxRecords()
        Gets the maximum number of records that the client wants to process, while it is requesting a base/delta sync operation from AppSync.
        Returns:
        The max number of records to process from AppSync.

      • getSyncPageSize

        public java.lang.Integer getSyncPageSize()
        Gets the number of items that should be requested in page, from AppSync, during a sync operation.
        Returns:
        Desired size of a page of results from an AppSync sync response

      • getSyncExpressions

        public java.util.Map<java.lang.String,DataStoreSyncExpression> getSyncExpressions()
        Returns the Map of all DataStoreSyncExpressions used to filter data received from AppSync, either during a sync or over the real-time subscription.
        Returns:
        the Map of all DataStoreSyncExpressions.
